objects.name: Débloquer l'expéditeur de l'e-mail
objects.description: Unblock a sender on email

objects.name: Obtenir la possibilité de mettre le fichier en quarantaine par format
objects.description: Make sure you have the ability to block a file from being accessed by its format

objects.name: Obtenir la capacité d'analyser un fichier PDF
objects.description: Make sure you have the ability to analyse a PDF file

objects.name: Bloquer le transfert de données par contenu
objects.description: Block data transferring by its content pattern (i.e. specific string, keyword, binary pattern etc)

objects.name: Lister les hôtes qui ont communiqués avec un domaine externe
objects.description: List hosts communicated with an external domain

objects.name: Obtenir la possibilité de répertorier les données transférées
objects.description: Make sure you have the ability to list the data that is being transferred at the moment or at a particular time in the past

objects.name: Obtenir la possibilité de bloquer le processus par le contenu de l'exécutable
objects.description: Make sure you have the ability to block process by its executable content pattern (i.e. specific string, keyword, binary pattern etc)

objects.name: Analyser un script
objects.description: Analyse a script file (i.e. Python, PowerShell, Bash scripts etc)

objects.name: Liste des hôtes connectés à l'intranet
objects.description: List hosts connected to the internal network at the moment or at a particular time in the past

objects.name: Répertorier les victimes de l'alerte de sécurité
objects.description: List victims of a security alert

objects.name: Bloquer le domaine de l'e-mail
objects.description: Block a domain name on an Email server
